conbody.p: Submit annual reports for DoD Waivers of the Contractor Employee Compensation Cap to DASN(P) no later than October 31 by email at usn.pentagon.asstsecnavrdadc.mbx.pabt@us.navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] NMCARS 5231.205-91 DoD Waivers of the Contractor Employee Compensation Cap” using the reporting guidance provided in Annex 23.
